body.p: My friend John Burns, like all lawyers, has in the excellence of his heart been beguiled by a needy and indigent client into entering as security for him -- left him in the lurch and judgment was rendered against him at this Term for $300 -- If you will exercise your power and remit the judgment I am sure that you will have done many worse things -- Please remit and oblige

R Apperson
To } Letter
Governor Bramlett
